meter_reading.notes: The odometer wheels clearly display '02271.4', which translates to 2271.4 cubic meters. The red needle on the circular dial points precisely to the '0.03' mark. The dial's 0.00-0.09 scale represents 10 divisions, each 36 degrees; thus, the 0.03 mark is 3 * 36 = 108 degrees clockwise from the 0.00 mark.
